alert.note: Alert for Benton; Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson, southeastern Benton and northern Decatur Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Parsons, or 13 miles east of Natchez Trace State Park, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Darden, Perryville, Busseltown, Jeannette, Wilkinstown, I-40 Near The Tennessee River, Mount Tabor, Sugar Tree, Garrett, Beacon, Hickory Forks, Cozette, Bible Hill and Chesterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
